channel.title: Requesting a logo!
channel.description:
Okay so i would love to have a nice logo done for a text based browers game im making :) here is what i would like
Text: Hero's Of MyZeria Colors: Blue,white with gold lining Texture:Think Bright (Sky) Additional Items: Dragon incorporated somewhere, or weapons
Thanks In Advance :)
